name: The Leggings of Yith'Sehta
data: It decreases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution superbly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
The leggings of Yith'Sehta lends superior healing to the wearer.
The leggings of Yith'Sehta add stability to the wearer.
